entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow early this evening. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 9.
